title: Ep124: 2nd Fife & Forfar Yeomanry - Hill 112
itunes:title: Ep124: 2nd Fife & Forfar Yeomanry - Hill 112
description:
Peter and Gary continue to follow the tanks of the 2nd Fife & Forfar Yeomanry as they take part in the bitter battle to capture Hill 112 in Normandy.


Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain

Publisher: Mat McLachlan

Producer: Jess Stebnicki
